title: (a) and (b) of subsection (1) of section 40 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Section 40)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Section 40) 

(Commencement of Certain Provisions) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2022 (section 40) (commencement certain provisions) order 2023

title: (a) and (b) of subsection (1) of section 40 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of
heading: 2. The 1st day of October 2023 is appointed as the day on which paragraphs
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of October 2023 is appointed as the day on which paragraphs 
(a) and (b) of subsection (1) of section 40 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 
2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 August, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [435] 3

ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
